content.heading: Tag
paragraphs:
The
tag inserts a single line break.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Empty tag with no closing tag.
Use for line breaks, not paragraph spacing.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
Poem:

Be not afraid of greatness.
Some are born great,
some achieve greatness,
and others have greatness thrust upon them.

-William Shakespeare
